caption.text: Conceptual limitations of systemic problems and blocking mechanisms.

cell.text: Systemic problems as contextual condition of other systemic problem
Different systemic problems cause the same activity
Different activities in one blocking mechanism are caused by different systemic problems
Systemic problems as contextual conditions for activities in a blocking mechanism
The same activities across different blocking mechanisms
Interaction of activities of different blocking mechanisms

statement.text: There are six types of Conceptual explanation.
Different activities in one blocking mechanism are caused by different systemic problems has Indirect interdependence of systemic problems.
The same activities across different blocking mechanisms has both Direct interdependence mechanisms and Indirect interdependence of systemic problems.
There are sixteen types of Conceptual explanation.
The table has been divided into five columns

cell.text: Well defined in terms of its nature (negative attributes of structural elements) but not clear in terms of how it affects system functioning
Lacks clear definition in terms of nature and how it affects system functioning
Included but not clear what they are and how they perform

statement.text: Systemic problem of Role of exogenous factors is not included.
